TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {298=Find the IG links for your 2012 Instructor's Guide here.}
textBeforeTable: Section One Enjoy! Find the IG links for your 2012 Instructor's Guide here. Please note: Sonlight does not control the content of these sites. We seek "family-friendly" options, but the web changes regularly and we cannot ensure the content you may encounter to will be appropriate. Please be present while your children browse these sites. To better meet your needs, we've compiled lists of all the hyperlinks found in our Instructor's Guides. That way, everything you need is all in one place. We update these IG links and check them on a regular basis for accuracy. Just click on the IG you are using for all the links in that program.
